function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exposure to contaminated urban green spaces leading to the spread of contagious diseases","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission in urban areas","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and disinfection of urban green spaces, public health education on hygiene practices","Technologies":"Disinfection equipment, IoT sensors for monitoring cleanliness","People":"General public, park visitors, wildlife","Owner":"Local government, park management authorities"},{"Description":"Inadequate waste management in urban green spaces leading to disease transmission","Impact":"Risk of disease transmission due to accumulation of waste and contaminants in green spaces","Mitigation":"Implementing proper waste management systems, regular cleaning and waste removal","Technologies":"Smart waste management systems, waste sorting and recycling programs","People":"Local residents, park visitors, waste management personnel","Owner":"Local government, waste management authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of proper maintenance leading to the breeding of disease-carrying insects and pests in green spaces","Impact":"Increased risk of vector-borne diseases and pest infestations in urban areas","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance and landscaping, pest control measures, community awareness programs","Technologies":"Smart pest control systems, IoT devices for monitoring maintenance needs","People":"General public, park visitors, maintenance personnel","Owner":"Local government, park management authorities"}]}
